items.summary: Update frontend/src/types/storage.ts to expand the ModelState interface with a nested signalWeights object containing oddsWeight (number), historicalBucketWeight (number), recentBucketWeight (number), and consistencyWeight (number) fields

Add calibrationScalar (number), confidenceScalingFactor (number), recentAccuracyWindow (number), driftDetectionState (object or appropriate type), and raceCount (number) fields to the ModelState interface in frontend/src/types/storage.ts

Update frontend/src/lib/storage.ts AsyncStorage implementation to initialize modelState with default values for all fields (signalWeights with default weight values, calibrationScalar, confidenceScalingFactor, recentAccuracyWindow, driftDetectionState, raceCount) when no existing modelState is found in localStorage
Add a writeModelState function to frontend/src/lib/storage.ts that accepts a ModelState object and persists it to AsyncStorage under the 'modelState' key with immutability enforcement

Update frontend/src/lib/statsCalculator.ts to add functions that compute updated signal weights and calibration parameters from race records, preparing for future integration with the prediction system
